trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SEQ_00<tab>Swygskyf believes you are ready to join a guildhest.

TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SEQ_01<tab>Guildhests are special operations organized by Adventurers' Guilds and overseen by battlewardens. To learn more about what guildhests entail, speak with Battlewarden Tiroro.

TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SEQ_02<tab>Battlewarden Tiroro explains that guildhests will test your ability to work with others to achieve a common goal. Unless you are content to conduct your adventures forever alone, it may be in your best interests to participate in these operations at least once.
TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SWYGSKYF_000_01<tab>By the by, a sturdy 'venturer like yerself might want to look into guildhests.

TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SWYGSKYF_000_02<tab>Have a word with Battlewarden Tiroro, and she'll give ye the details. Don't ye fret now, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─I'll set her straight if she has any doubts as to yer ability.
TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_TIRORO_000_01<tab>Word travels quickly in Swiftperch. Here to learn about guildhests, are we?

TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_TIRORO_000_02<tab>What's a guildhest? Why, it's a be<var 1A 02 /var>hest<var 1A 01 /var> issued by the Adventurers' <var 1A 02 /var>Guild<var 1A 01 /var>, savvy? When a certain task brought to the attention of the guild is a little too grand for a leve, but not grand enough for Grand Company involvement, they're deemed guildhests and sent to yours truly.

TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_TIRORO_000_03<tab>But don't let the lack of grandeur fool you. The tasks are anythin' but simple. Most take place in tight quarters, and <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> require precision teamwork 'twixt you and your battlemates.
TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_TIRORO_000_04<tab>And so what do you get in return for placin' your neck on the loppin' block? Besides a beamin' grin from Battlewarden Tiroro Tiro? Fame, fortune, the usual.
TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_TIRORO_000_05<tab>So, I presume you'll be joinin' our next operation?
TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>You have unlocked the Duty Finder! This feature allows you to undertake multiplayer duties without having to form a party on your own.

TEXT_SUBSEA906_00059_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>To bring up the Duty Finder interface, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Finder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
